content.rendered: If you know of any Salesforce Events that are happening, please fill out this Google Form with the information. Or if you have any information on the events that are missing info, please fill out the Event Form below as well.

excerpt.rendered: If you know of any Salesforce Events that are happening, please fill out this Google Form with the information. Or if you have any information on the events that are missing info, please fill out the Event Form below as well.
